description: Iron Frontier - Complete Enemy Database. All enemy types organized by category.

enemies.description: A scrappy desert predator that hunts in packs of 2-3. Fast and persistent.

abilities.name: Pack Howl
abilities.description: Alerts nearby coyotes, potentially calling reinforcements

enemies.description: A venomous serpent coiled in the rocks. Low health but delivers a poisonous bite.

abilities.name: Venomous Bite
abilities.description: Inflicts poison damage over 3 turns

enemies.description: A desert scorpion with a thick carapace. High defense for its size, venomous sting.

abilities.name: Venomous Sting
abilities.description: Tail strike that applies poison

enemies.description: A scavenging bird that swoops down on travelers. Steals provisions when it strikes.

abilities.name: Swooping Strike
abilities.description: Dive attack that can steal items

enemies.description: A fierce pack hunter. Coordinates attacks with other wolves for devastating ambushes.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.description: Gains +25% damage when attacking with other wolves

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.description: Calls nearby wolves to aid in combat

enemies.description: A lean, hungry predator of the wastes.
A powerful feline ambush predator. Fast and hits hard with razor-sharp claws.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Leaps at target from distance, dealing bonus damage

abilities.name: Rend
abilities.description: Savage claw attack causing bleeding

enemies.description: A massive grizzly bear. Slow but devastating when it connects. Tough hide reduces damage.

abilities.name: Maul
abilities.description: Devastating attack that stuns the target

abilities.name: Thick Hide
abilities.description: Passive: Reduces incoming damage by 20%

enemies.description: A monstrous scorpion the size of a dog. Heavily armored carapace and deadly venom.

abilities.name: Pincer Crush
abilities.description: Grabs and crushes target, preventing movement

abilities.name: Lethal Sting
abilities.description: Powerful venom attack dealing high poison damage

enemies.description: A terrifying apex predator of the canyon system. Coordinates with pack members for devastating ambushes.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.description: +50% damage when other stalkers are present

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: +30% damage on first attack

enemies.description: A desperate criminal surviving on the frontier. Basic equipment but dangerous in numbers.
A desperate criminal with little to lose.
A pistol-wielding outlaw who prefers to fight from range.

abilities.name: Quick Shot
abilities.description: Rapid fire attack at reduced accuracy

enemies.description: A pistol-wielding outlaw.
A hulking enforcer who relies on brute strength. Slow but can take a beating.

abilities.name: Heavy Swing
abilities.description: Powerful melee attack that knocks back target

enemies.description: A deadly accurate rifleman who prefers to keep distance.

abilities.name: Aimed Shot
abilities.description: Carefully aimed shot with bonus damage and accuracy

enemies.description: The leader of a bandit gang. Commands respect and buffs nearby allies.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.description: Buffs nearby allies, increasing their damage by 20%

abilities.name: Call Reinforcements
abilities.description: Summons additional bandits to the fight

enemies.description: A bandit who has fashioned mining equipment into makeshift armor. Slow but nearly impenetrable.

abilities.name: Ore Plating
abilities.description: First hit each turn deals 50% reduced damage

enemies.description: A quick-draw artist with a mean streak. High damage and deadly accurate.

abilities.name: Quick Draw
abilities.description: Fast shot that goes first in initiative

abilities.name: Fan the Hammer
abilities.description: Rapid fire all remaining shots at reduced accuracy

enemies.description: A heavily armored gang enforcer. Tough as nails and armed with a shotgun.

abilities.name: Shotgun Blast
abilities.description: Devastating close-range attack

enemies.description: A tough gang member who does the dirty work.
A quick-draw artist loyal to the gang.
A demolitions expert who loves making things go boom.

abilities.name: Dynamite Toss
abilities.description: Throws explosive dealing AoE damage

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: Creates smoke cover reducing enemy accuracy

enemies.description: An elite Copperhead assassin who dual-wields poisoned revolvers. Strikes fast and vanishes.

abilities.name: Venom Rounds
abilities.description: Attacks apply poison DoT for 3 turns

abilities.name: Twin Strike
abilities.description: Fires both revolvers simultaneously

enemies.description: A trusted lieutenant of the infamous Red Eye. Mini-boss level threat with gang backing.

abilities.name: Gang Tactics
abilities.description: Coordinates with nearby gang members for focused fire

enemies.description: A hardened Freeminer warrior fighting for their claim. Expert with a pickaxe and fiercely protective of allies.

abilities.name: Stand Your Ground
abilities.description: Reduces damage to nearby allies by 30%

enemies.description: A company security guard protecting IVRC interests.
An elite company sniper.

abilities.name: Precision Shot
abilities.description: High accuracy shot targeting weak points

enemies.description: A seasoned commander of IVRC security forces.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: Orders nearby guards to focus fire on target

enemies.description: A decorated IVRC security captain with elite training. Commands guards and carries company-issued gear.

abilities.name: Commanding Presence
abilities.description: Nearby IVRC units deal +25% damage

abilities.name: Tactical Retreat
abilities.description: Orders allies to reposition while providing covering fire

enemies.description: A small mechanical drone that patrols ancient ruins. High armor but limited offense.

abilities.name: Steam Burst
abilities.description: Releases pressurized steam in a cone

enemies.description: A massive steam-powered construct. Extremely slow but hits like a locomotive.

abilities.name: Crushing Blow
abilities.description: Devastating ground-pound attack

enemies.description: An advanced steam-powered automaton with self-repair protocols. Fires pressurized steam at range.

abilities.name: Self-Repair
abilities.description: Heals 15 HP at end of turn if not attacked

abilities.name: Pressurized Steam
abilities.description: High-pressure steam attack

enemies.description: A miner twisted by exposure to strange machinery. Once human, now something else.

abilities.name: Maddened Fury
abilities.description: Frenzied attacks when below 50% health

enemies.description: A nightmarish fusion of machine and something organic. Late-game threat with multiple attack types.

abilities.name: Mechanical Tentacle
abilities.description: Grasping attack that pulls target closer

abilities.name: Steam Scream
abilities.description: Terrifying screech that reduces accuracy of all enemies

abilities.name: Flaying Claws
abilities.description: Multi-hit attack with bleed

enemies.description: A mechanical guardian from a forgotten age.

abilities.name: Defensive Protocol
abilities.description: Increases armor when stationary

enemies.description: A fast, agile reconnaissance machine.

abilities.name: Alert Protocol
abilities.description: Calls for reinforcements when enemies detected

enemies.description: A massive, heavily armored war machine.

abilities.name: Siege Mode
abilities.description: Becomes immobile but gains +50% damage

abilities.name: Armor Plating
abilities.description: Passive: Immune to critical hits
